name: Spike Cannon
summary: Deals damage; is a multi-turn attack. 33.3% it will hit twice, 33.3% it hits 3 times, and 16.7% chance it will hit four or five times.
viability: Spike Cannon isn't really recommended. Cloyster has two great multi-hit moves (Icicle Spear and Rock Blast) to use with Skill Link. Spike Cannon isn't going to have as much of an impact.
